column5: ran across this Bass fisherman(that's what he told us anyways) out on Simoce on our way home from Perchin. "They arent in shallow ya know" ..............    you can see his two Bass riggers one of which is still down with the rod in the boat.             Caught a nice feed of Perch......
Are those bass grey with a forked tail by chance?
Hey .. like they say Andy.. what ever presentation you are comfortable with and have faith in... go for it!
just bescause you suck and you don't know what your doing doesnt mean everyone else is doing it wrong!!! hahaha with more ppl like that around the better fishing is to be had by all!
Dragging a tube maybe,hell maybe even a new way to drop shot? LOL    Ah no pics,no believe. Ah who am I kiding,yer da perch queen.

That's Perch King to you Sir.....  Sorry Brian. The only picture I did take was of the Bass rigger fisher people. He had his GF with him as well. All the eprch were caught in 26 to 31 fow out on the east side of the lake by the islands there. Better?
